page.title: 17Transport In Ogmore Vale
page.content: Between 0930 and 1000 on 5-6-85 37 cars, 7 vans,2 buses 4 lorries and 2 bicycles travelled along North Road and 58 cars, 10 vans and 2 motorbikes travelled along Aber Road. We asked 90 chidren if they had a bicycle and 70 said they did. We asked the same number if their parents owned a car 49 said they owned 1 and 9 said they owned more than 1. There are 2 frequent National Welsh buses which serve the area, taxi hire and 2 private coach companies. The sigle track railway running to the washery is sometimes used bt tourists for sight seeing. A 30 m.p.h. speed limit exists for the whole of the area. A gallon of four star petrol at the crossing filling station at Ogmore Vale costs Â£1.99.
